name: ilearnngrow Shut the box
description: Introducing our timeless game of Shut the Box, a captivating blend of luck, strategy, and arithmetic. This beautifully crafted wooden game is designed for players of all ages to enjoy. Whether gathered with friends and family or played solo, Shut the Box promises hours of entertainment and mental stimulation.Reignite the joy of classic gaming with Shut the Box. Crafted with precision and designed for all ages, this game promises entertainment, mental stimulation, and hours of fun. Order yours today and experience the thrill of Shutting the Box!
content:
Quality Craftsmanship: Our Shut the Box game is expertly crafted from premium wood, ensuring durability and a smooth, polished finish. The tactile experience enhances the overall gameplay.
 
 Classic Gameplay with a Modern Touch: Relive the joy of this age-old game, where quick thinking and tactical decisions are essential. The game's straightforward rules make it accessible to players of all skill levels.
 
 Educational and Stimulating: Shut the Box is not just a game; it's a fun way to sharpen mathematical skills. Players must strategically eliminate numbers, making it a dynamic and engaging learning experience.
 
 Versatile Entertainment: Suitable for solo play, head-to-head competition, or group settings, Shut the Box adapts to your preference. It's perfect for family gatherings, game nights, or quiet evenings at home.
 
 Set Up the Game: Place the Shut the Box game board on a flat surface. Ensure that the wooden sliders are in the "open" position, displaying all the numbers.
 Roll the Dice: Each player takes turns rolling a pair of dice. The total of the dice roll represents the number of points that need to be covered on the board.
 Slide the Numbers: Players use the combination of numbers rolled on the dice to "shut" corresponding numbered tiles on the board. For instance, if a player rolls a 7, they can choose to close the 7 or use combinations (e.g., 3 and 4).
 Continue Rolling and Closing Tiles: Players take turns rolling the dice and closing tiles until they are unable to make a valid move. At that point, their turn ends, and the total sum of the open tiles is recorded as their score.
 Winning the Game: The objective is to close all the tiles. The player with the lowest score, or the one who successfully closes all tiles first or maximum tiles, wins the game

 Using the paints provided, let your imagination take flight! Apply colors to the designated cut outs on the frame. Don't be afraid to get creative with your color choices. Allow the paint to dry thoroughly.
 Adorn with Space-Themed Cut Outs:
 Once the paint is dry, select your favorite space-themed cut outs from the kit. Arrange them evenly around the frame, ensuring a balanced and visually appealing layout.
 Insert the Clock Mechanism:
 Locate the hole in the center of the wooden frame. Take the clock mechanism provided and carefully insert the spindle through this hole, ensuring it fits snugly.
 Attach the Clock Hands:
 Gently press the hour, minute, and second hands onto the corresponding spindles of the clock mechanism, securing them in place.
 Setting the Time:
 Turn the clock hands to set the correct time according to your preference.
 Power Source (if applicable):
 If your clock requires batteries, insert them into the designated compartment on the back of the clock mechanism.
 Hang Your Masterpiece:
 Find the perfect spot on your wall for your newly crafted space-themed clock. Use a suitable nail or hook to securely hang it, making sure it's level and well-positioned.

name: ilearnngrow DIY Rainbow Candle
description: Introducing our DIY Rainbow Candle Kit - a burst of color and creativity in one delightful package! Unleash your inner artist and craft a stunning, multi-hued candle that will brighten up any space with its vibrant charm.
content:
Complete Crafting Experience: Our kit comes with everything you need to create your very own rainbow candle. From premium-quality wax in an array of vivid colors to wicks, molds, and comprehensive instructions, we've got you covered.
 Endless Color Possibilities: Dive into a world of color and let your imagination run wild. Mix and match the included pigments to create unique shades and gradients, or follow our suggested combinations for a picture-perfect rainbow effect.
 Safe and Non-Toxic: Craft with peace of mind knowing that our materials are non-toxic, odorless, and safe for all ages. The wax is easy to work with and melts smoothly, making it a perfect project for beginners and seasoned crafters alike.

How To Make Rainbow Candles at Home - Step by step
 This candle required only a few materials and an easy-to-follow method, making it one of the easiest to make. 
 Step 1: Measure Your Ingredients
 Step 2: Melt Your Wax
 Once your wax has melted, add your color of choice, either color dye powder or liquid dye.Add a tiny spoon of candle color powder and gently mix until the color has spread evenly; add more dye if you want a brighter color. Pour the wax into your candle glass slowly and gently to produce your initial layer. To attach the wick and assure it is suspended taut and upright, use a wick centring tool.
 Allow 1–2 hours for the candle to set before adding the next color layer.
 Step 3: Repeat The Process
 Repeat for each color until your glass is 1cm from the top.
 If you have sinkholes on your last layer, save any leftover wax from redoing the pour.
 Allow your candle to cool completely before using it.
 Trim the wick to the desired length.
 Put your new candle to the test.

name: ilearnngrow Maths Calculator
description: Introducing our Maths Calculator, the perfect tool to help children master addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division with confidence and enjoyment. Math is an essential life skill, and our calculator turns those daunting plus, minus, division, and multiplication signs into friendly companions for young learners.
content:
Simplified Math Operations: Our Maths Calculator focuses on the core operations of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, offering a straightforward and engaging learning experience.
 
 Interactive Learning: The calculator's innovative design encourages hands-on learning. By rolling the rings to select numbers and operations, children actively participate in the learning process.
 
 Boosts Problem-Solving Skills: By presenting mathematical challenges in a playful way, the Maths Calculator helps develop critical problem-solving abilities in children, setting a strong foundation for their academic journey.
 
 Engaging Learning Experience: Our Maths Calculator turns learning into a dynamic and interactive experience, promoting active engagement in mathematical concepts.
 
 Confidence Building: By encouraging independent problem-solving, the calculator helps children build confidence in their mathematical abilities.
 
 Foundation for Academic Success: Mastering addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division lays a solid groundwork for future mathematical achievements.
 
  Roll and Choose: Roll the rings to select the numbers you want to work with. This interactive step adds an element of excitement to the learning process.
 
 Select Operation: Upon rolling the middle ring, choose from addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division. This step empowers children to decide which operation they want to practice.
 
 Find the Answer: Let the child roll the answer ring, providing them with the opportunity to engage actively in finding the correct answer to the chosen operation.
 
 Verify the Result: Once the answer is determined, verify if it's correct. This step encourages independent thinking and builds confidence in mathematical skills.

name: ilearnngrow Elephant Face shaped Rattle
description:
Introducing our Elephant Faced Shape Rattle, a delightful and eco-conscious sensory toy crafted with care and consideration. Made from organic cotton cloth, this rattle offers a safe and engaging playtime experience for your little one while prioritizing environmental sustainability.
 
 Key Features:
 
 Endearing Elephant Design: This rattle features an adorable elephant face design that is sure to captivate your baby's imagination and introduce them to the wonders of the animal kingdom.
 Organic Cotton Craftsmanship: Crafted from soft, organic cotton cloth, this rattle is free from harmful chemicals, ensuring a safe and nurturing playtime experience for your precious one.
 Sensory Stimulation: The gentle rattle sound and different textures of the fabric provide sensory stimulation, promoting auditory and tactile development in a soothing and enjoyable manner.
 Easy-to-Grip Shape: Designed with a shape that is perfectly suited for little hands to hold and explore, this rattle promotes fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.

Introduce the Rattles:
 Show the rattles to your baby and let them explore the different designs, textures, and shapes. Talk to them about the colors and patterns.
 
 Encourage Grasping:
 Place the rattles in your baby's hand and gently guide their fingers around the rattle. Encourage them to grasp and hold onto it.
 
 Demonstrate the Rattle Sound:
 Gently shake the rattle to produce a soft, soothing sound. This auditory stimulation can captivate your baby's attention.
 
 Observe Sensory Exploration:
 Allow your baby to explore the rattle using their sense of touch. They may enjoy feeling the fabric, patterns, and textures with their fingers.
 
 Tummy Time Play:
 During tummy time, place the rattles within your baby's reach. This encourages reaching and swatting motions, promoting muscle development.
 
 Interactive Playtime:
 Engage with your baby by shaking the rattles gently, creating a pleasing sound. Encourage them to watch and listen.
